MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Any Windows or MS-DOS or OS/2 or *nix, or anything that can run Perl 4 or 5

English.Char_Desc_80: Converts .DBF files to .CSV. With Perl source code and 3 tiny Perl interpreters
English.Char_Desc_250: DBF2CSV is a free utility to convert .DBF (dBase/xBase) database files to .CSV text format (comma-separated values). Full Perl 4/5 source code is included, along with 3 tiny Perl v4 interpreters. For Windows, DOS, OS/2, *nix, etc.
English.Char_Desc_450: DBF2CSV is a free utility to convert .DBF (dBase/xBase) database files to .CSV text format (comma-separated values) or .json format. Full source code is included. Written in Perl. DBF2CSV.ZIP includes three tiny Perl v4 interpreters in case you don't already have Perl installed. Runs under any version of Windows, as well as DOS, OS/2, and probably Linux and any other OS that supports Perl version 4 or 5.
English.Char_Desc_2000: DBF2CSV is a free utility to convert .DBF (dBase/xBase) database files to .CSV text format (comma-separated values) or .json (JSON) format. Full source code is included. Written in Perl. DBF2CSV.ZIP includes three tiny Perl v4 interpreters in case you don't already have Perl installed. Runs under any version of Windows, as well as DOS, OS/2, and probably Linux and any other OS that supports Perl version 4 or 5.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: dbf2csv.pl is uncopyrighted, so do with it whatever you wish. The three tiny Perl 4 interpreters included in the .zip file are copyrighted by Larry Wall, and may be copied only under the terms of either the Artistic License or the GNU General Public License, which may be found in the Perl 4.0 source kit. For the Perl 4.0 source code, see http://www.burtonsys.com/auxil/

Simtel.Simtel_DOS_Category: Utilities/Drivers/System Files - fileutil File Management and Conversion Utils
